description: This Java source file defines a Spring Boot REST controller named ScoreController that exposes API endpoints for creating and retrieving game scores. It includes endpoints for adding new scores and fetching the top scores, utilizing a repository for data access, DTOs for request and response handling, and Swagger annotations for API documentation.

classes.name: ScoreController
classes.description: Spring REST controller managing score-related API endpoints for creating and retrieving scores.

methods.name: createScore
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new score entry in the system.

methods.name: getTopScores
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve the top 10 scores ordered by points and creation time.
